DOC.detailed_description: Phase 0 / I : At level 1 include three patient . If patient suffers dose limit toxicity ( DLT ) , proceeds increase dose next level . If 2/3 patient experience DLT , close increase dose extend / investigate previous dose level 3 additional patient . If level 2 , less 1/3 minimum 6 patient experience TLD reach , phase I suspend expect another rise Level 2 . Dose level : - Level 1 : Nintedanib 150 mg twice daily + oral letrozole 2.5 mg / day orally , cycle 28 day . - Level 2 : Nintedanib 200 mg twice daily via oral + letrozole 2.5 mg / day orally , cycle 28 day . - At least first cycle administer Phase I . A total six four-week cycle administer discretion investigator .
